13/*
14 * Structure for building "argc/argv" vector of arguments.
15 *
16 * !!!
17 * All arguments are nul terminated as well as having an associated length.
18 * The argument vector is NOT necessarily NULL terminated. The proper way
19 * to check the number of arguments is to use the argc value in the EXCMDARG
20 * structure or to walk the array until an ARGS structure with a length of 0
21 * is found.
22 */
23typedef struct _args {
24 CHAR_T *bp; /* Argument. */
25 size_t blen; /* Buffer length. */
26 size_t len; /* Argument length. */
27
28#define A_ALLOCATED 0x01 /* If allocated space. */
29 u_int8_t flags;
30} ARGS;
31
